meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Three</kanji> <kanji>individual</kanji>s is <vocabulary>three small things</vocabulary>. The kanji 個 can be used to count small objects, just like this! Try other numbers as well.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
